title: Goldman Sachs’ Petershill, a Collection of Private-Equity Stakes, Slides After IPO
sub_head: Petershill Partners is down 9% since its lackluster debut in London last month
body:
Goldman Sachs Group Inc. specializes in taking companies public. It is having a tougher time with one closer to home.
Shares of Petershill Partners PLC, an investment vehicle managed by Goldman’s asset-management arm, are down 9% since its initial public offering late last month. That is worse than both the broader market and peers.
